'''''Sangonomiya Supplications''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must talk to [[Gorou]] after the "Question Todoroki" step in {{Quest|The Missing Thing #Confrontation}}.
